title: Should you tell your partner about your mental health condition?
text: If you have just started dating someone, then this conversation should probably wait. According to Psychologist Barbara Greenberg, you should speak with your partner on your illness "whenever the relationship has matured to the point where it feels comfortable — usually, around the three-month mark." The reason for this is, by that time "your partner probably already appreciates the personality qualities that have helped you live well despite a mental health condition. By sharing your health history," they add, "you share insight into not just your challenges but also your strengths."
description: There are many serious conversations that we tend to have with our partner. The trickiest ones tend to be our struggle with emotions.
